column1: Billions in COVID relief funds are laying dormant across the country held hostage by red tape.   Even in Sarasota we have plenty to distribute. I will fight in Congress to get the deadline extension our community needs.  https://t.co/TPCHSzyjJw

Honored to be with President @realDonaldTrump in Ft. Myers today!  He has fought tirelessly for Florida’s seniors lowering healthcare costs and increasing options. We thank him for being a warrior for Medicare and helping us turn the corner to beat COVID-19. https://t.co/s3YV4Dma2N

Last night I joined @LizMacDonaldFOX to discuss the effects of COVID-19 on our immigration system and the DOJ's progress in keeping our communities safe with Operation LeGend.  Watch the full interview here. https://t.co/kyNzgVvvS6

More promising news for America's farmers!  Thank you to @SecretarySonny for expanding the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program (CFAP) by $14 billion.  We owe it to the farmers and producers feeding our families as they bounce back from COVID-19.

President Trump deferred payroll taxes for most workers in order to support Americans during COVID-19.   I recently cosponsored the Support Workers Families and Social Security Act to implement similar tax relief by forgiving the owed taxes while keeping Social Security strong.

Over 1.4 million jobs were added back to our economy last month!   This makes August the 4th consecutive month of strong job gains during COVID-19.   Our country is back to work and I look forward to seeing these numbers continue to rise. https://t.co/6zcM1SOs4W

Looking forward to welcoming @realDonaldTrump to Florida this afternoon!  Thanks to his Administration's COVID response Florida has received over: ✔️4.4M N-95 masks ✔️1.1M surgical & procedural masks ✔️220K eye & face shields ✔️190K gowns & 1M gloves

Today we celebrate the heart of our economy America’s workforce. Millions of jobs are coming back as our country recovers from the impact of COVID-19 making this year’s Labor Day even more special. Enjoy the holiday as we pay tribute to our nation’s workforce. Happy Labor Day! https://t.co/7nkJTLO7fw
